verses.verse: <S%H8199>Judge<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%> against a <S%H3808>ungodly<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: O <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H5766>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

For you are the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength<s%>: why do you cast me <S%H2186>off<s%>? why <S%H1980>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?

O send <S%H7971>out<s%> your <S%H216>light<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%>: let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H935>me<s%>; let them bring me unto your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>, and to your <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>.

Then will I <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H8057>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1524>joy<s%>: <S%H3658>Yes<s%>, upon the harp will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>, O God my <S%H430>God<s%>.

Why are you cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> inside <S%H3176>me<s%>? hope in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3444>him<s%>, who is the health of my <S%H6440>favor<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
